name: GrayscaleMode
description: Grayscale Mode without digging through your device settings!

toggle-grayscale.name: Toggle Grayscale Mode
toggle-grayscale.description: Toggles Grayscale Mode when playing a level.

raise-intensity.name: Raise Intensity
raise-intensity.description: Increase the intensity of Grayscale Mode by 0.01.

lower-intensity.name: Lower Intensity
lower-intensity.description: Decrease the intensity of Grayscale Mode by 0.01.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
